footer.title: All things related to Discord all in one place.

premiumPage.title: Premium Membership
premiumPage.subtitle: Unlock exclusive features and earn benefits by purchasing Premium. With annual & lifetime plans, you get to save more!

toast.creatingCheckout: We are creating a checkout for you...
toast.checkoutCreated: Checkout created! Redirecting you to the payment page in few seconds...

features.label: Exclusive Premium Badge
features.info: Show off your Premium status with an exclusive badge on your bots/servers & profile.

features.label: Stunning Card Effects
features.info: Get exclusive card effects for your bot/server & profile cards.

features.label: Premium Preferred Hosts
features.info: Ability to use dsc.wtf, dsc.mom, dsc.dog hostnames for your profile.

features.label: Profile Card Colors
features.info: Customize your profile card with a variety of colors.

features.label: Doubled Votes
features.info: Double the count of votes on your servers and bots.

features.label: Vote Rewards Limit (per server)
features.info: Maximum amount of vote rewards you can create per server.

features.label: Links Limit
features.info: Maximum amount of links you can create.

features.label: Colorful Name in Panels
features.info: Stand out with a colorful name on server panels.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.title: Frequently Asked Questions
frequentlyAskedQuestions.subtitle: Do you have a question? Check out our FAQ section below.

items.label: What is a Premium Membership?
items.content: Premium Membership is a subscription-based service that yield exclusive features and content to you on our platform.

items.label: What is the cost of Premium Membership?
items.content: The cost of Premium Membership is $3.00 per month. We also offer a discounted annual subscription for $25.00 per year (save $11.00) and a lifetime subscription for $60.00.

items.label: How can I subscribe as a Premium Membership?
items.content: You can subscribe as a Premium Membership by clicking on the "Create Checkout" button on this page. You will be redirected to the checkout page where you can complete the payment process. Once the payment is successful, you will be given a Premium Membership subscription.

items.label: Can I request a refund for Premium Membership?
items.content: We do not offer refunds for Premium Membership. However, you can cancel your subscription at any time, and you will not be charged for the next billing cycle.

items.label: Can I transfer my Premium Membership to another account?

toast.uploadingSound: Sound {{soundName}} is being uploaded to guild...

toast.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to like sounds!

toast.soundDeleted: {{soundName}} successfully deleted. You will be redirected to the home page in a few seconds.

notApprovedInfo.description: Currently, only you can see this sound. Once the sound is approved, it will become public. Until then, you can come to <link> and get a notification from our bot when your sound is approved. Make sure you open your DMs.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.title: Frequently Asked Questions
labels: How can I download a sound?
How can I add a sound to my Discord server soundboard?
This sound is inappropriate. What can I do?
answers: You can use the button below to download <span> sound.

answers.title: I'm glad to hear that! There are 2 ways to add sounds to your Discord server.

methods.instructionsBefore: Using our website, you can upload this sound to your server with just a few clicks. Here how you can do this:
instructions: Click the "Upload to Discord" button on the sound card in this page.
Select the server you want to upload the sound to & click the upload button.
Tada! Now sound is added to the server.

methods.instructionsBefore: This may be a little more challenging.
instructions: Download the sound:
Open your Discord App and right click to your server.
Go to Server Settings > Soundboard
Click the Upload Sound.
Fill the form and select the sound you downloaded and click the upload button.
Tada! Now sound is added to the server.

answers: You can join our support server via the Discord button at the bottom of the page (Footer) and let us know by reporting that the sound is inappropriate.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: You can delete the sound using the button below, but be careful not to delete it by mistake :)

deleteSoundModal.title: Delete Sound
deleteSoundModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{soundName}}?
deleteSoundModal.content:
Please note that deleting the sound will remove all the downloads that the sound has received.

This action cannot be undone.

category.description: Select the category that your server belongs to. This will help users find your server.

keywords.description: Add keywords to your server. This will help people find your server on discord.place. Separate each keyword with a comma.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.title: Frequently Asked Questions
labels: How can I download an emoji?
How can I add an emoji to my Discord server?
This emoji is inappropriate. What can I do?
answers: You can use the button below to download <span> emoji.

answers.title: I'm glad to hear that! There are 3 ways to download an emoji.

methods.instructionsBefore: Using our bot & website, you can upload this emoji to your server with just a few clicks. Here's how:
instructions: Click "Upload to Discord" button on emoji preview in this page.
Select the server you want to upload the emoji & click the upload button.
Tada! Now emoji is added to the server.

methods.instructionsBefore: Using our bot, you can upload this emoji to your server with a single command. Here's how:
instructions: Copy & Paste this to any channel: <pre>
Use the command and tada! Now emoji is added to the server.

methods.instructionsBefore: This may be a little more challenging.
instructions: Download the emoji:
Open your Discord App and right click to your server.
Go to Server Settings > Emoji.
Click the Upload Emoji.
Select the emoji you downloaded before.
Tada! Now emoji is added to the server.

answers: You can join our support server via the Discord button at the bottom of the page (Footer) and let us know that the emoji is inappropriate.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: You can remove the emoji using the button below, but be careful not to delete it by mistake :)

deleteEmojiModal.title: Remove Emoji
deleteEmojiModal.description: Are you sure you want to remove {{emojiName}}?
deleteEmojiModal.content:
Please note that removing the emoji will remove all the downloads that the emoji has received.

This action cannot be undone.

toast.emojiPackageDeleted: Successfully removed package {{emojiName}}. You will be redirected to the home page in a few seconds.

notApprovedInfo.description: Currently, only you can see the emoji package. Once the it is approved, it will become public. Until then, you can come to <link> and get a notification from our bot when your emoji package is approved. Make sure you open your DMs.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.title: Frequently Asked Questions
labels: How can I download an emoji pack?
How can I add an emoji pack to my Discord server?
This emoji pack is inappropriate. What can I do?
answers: You can use the button below to download <span> package.

answers.title: I'm glad to hear that! There are 2 ways to download an emoji package.

methods.instructionsBefore: Using our bot & website, you can upload these emojis to your server with just a few clicks. Here how you can do this:
instructions: Click "Upload to Discord" button on emoji preview that you want to upload in emojis preview grid.
Select the server you want to upload the emoji & click the upload button.
Tada! The emojis are added to the server.

methods.instructionsBefore: This may be a little more challenging.
instructions: Download the emoji pack:
Extract the downloaded pack.
Open your Discord App and right click to your server.
Go to Server Settings > Emoji.
Select all uploaded emojis and drag and drop them to the Discord screen.
Tada! Now emoji pack is added to the server.

answers: You can join our support server via the Discord button at the bottom of the page (Footer) and let us know by reporting that the emoji package is inappropriate.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: You can remove the emoji using the button below, but be careful not to delete it by mistake :)

deleteEmojiModal.title: Remove Emoji Package
deleteEmojiModal.description: Are you sure you want to remove {{emojiName}}?
deleteEmojiModal.content:
Please note that removing the emoji package will remove all emojis in the package and the package itself.

This action cannot be undone.

toast.destinationUrlHavePort: Link destination cannot have a port.

deleteLinkModal.title: Remove Link
deleteLinkModal.description: Are you sure you want to remove the link?
deleteLinkModal.note:
Please note that removing your link will remove all visits that your link has received.

This action cannot be undone.

myServers.title: My Servers
myServers.subtitle: View or manage the servers that you have listed on discord.place.

listedServers.title: Listed Servers
listedServers.subtitle: You can see the servers that you have listed on discord.place here.

emptyErrorState.title: It's quiet here...
emptyErrorState.message: You have not listed any servers on discord.place.

unlistedServers.title: Unlisted Servers
unlistedServers.subtitle: You can see the servers that you have unlisted on discord.place here.

missingServerInfo.title: Can't see your server?
missingServerInfo.description:
You can only add servers that you own. If you can't see your server, make sure you're the owner of the server.
If you still can't see your server, make sure is in your server.

emptyErrorState.title: It's quiet in here...
emptyErrorState.message: You do not have any unlisted servers on discord.place.

newServer.title: Adding <serverIcon> <serverName>
newServer.subtitle: You're about to add {{serverName}} to discord.place. This means your server will be listed on discord.place and everyone will be able to see it. You can remove your server from discord.place at any time..

toast.serverAdded: {{serverName}} added! You will be redirected to {{serverName}} page in a few seconds.
toast.duplicateKeyword: You can't use the same keyword twice.

requirements.title: Meet the requirements
requirements.subtitle: You need to meet the following requirements to add your server to the list.

enough_members.name: Minimum Member Count
enough_members.description: Your server must have at least 100 members.

old_enough.name: Minimum Server Age
old_enough.description: Your server must be at least 14 days old.

has_icon.name: Server Icon
has_icon.description: Your server must have a icon.

2fa_enabled.name: Two-Factor Authentication
2fa_enabled.description: Your server must have Two-Factor Authentication enabled for server moderators.

is_community.name: Community Server
is_community.description: Your server must be a Community Server.

no_nsfw.name: No NSFW Content
no_nsfw.description: Your server must not contain NSFW content.

description.label: Add a description
description.description:
This is the description that will be shown to everyone who visits your server on discord.place.
Make sure to include important information about your server.

inviteLink.label: Invite Link
inviteLink.description:
Add an invite link to your server. This will be helpful for people who want to join your server.
Make sure to set the invite link to never expire.

category.label: Category
category.description: Select a base category for your server. This will help people find your server on discord.place.

keywords.label: Keywords
keywords.description: Add keywords to your server. This will help people find your server on discord.place.
keywords.placeholder: Type a keyword and press enter or space..

voiceActivity.label: Voice Activity
voiceActivity.description: Check this box if you want to enable voice activity tracking for your server. This will help people see how voice active your server is.

contentPolicy.label: Content Policy
contentPolicy.description: By adding your server to discord.place, you agree to our Server Submission Guidelines. <note>
contentPolicy.note: * Can be found in our Discord server.

areYouReady.label: Are you ready?
areYouReady.description: By clicking the button below, you agree to our Server Submission Guidelines and you confirm that you are the owner of the server.

myBots.title: My Bots
myBots.subtitle: View or manage the bot that you have listed on discord.place. You can also submit a new bot to discord.place.

listedBots.title: Listed Bots
listedBots.subtitle: You can see the bots that you have listed on discord.place here.

emptyErrorState.title: It's quiet in here...
emptyErrorState.message: You have not listed any bots on discord.place.

newBot.title: New Bot
newBot.subtitle: Submit a new bot to discord.place.

note.title: Note
note.description: Your submitted bot will be reviewed by our team before it is listed on discord.place. Please make sure that your bot is not violating our bot submission guidelines. Our bot submission guidelines can be found in our <link>.

addBot.title: Adding a new bot
addBot.subtitle: You're about to submit a new bot to discord.place. This means your bot will be listed on discord.place and everyone will be able to see it. You can remove your bot from discord.place at any time.

toast.botAdded: Bot {{botId}} added! You will be redirected to the bot page in a few seconds.

botId.label: Bot ID
botId.description: This is the ID of your bot on Discord. You can find it in the developer portal.

shortDescription.label: Short Description
shortDescription.description: A short description of your bot. This will be shown in search results.

longDescription.label: Long Description
longDescription.description: This is the more detailed description of your bot. You can use this to tell everyone what your bot does and how it works. You can use markdown here.

inviteUrl.label: Invite URL
inviteUrl.description: This is the invite URL of your bot. This is the link that users will use to add your bot to their server. You can use default Discord authorization link or custom one.

categories.label: Categories
categories.description: Select all categories that your bot belongs to. This will help users find your bot.

contentPolicy.label: Content Policy
contentPolicy.description: By adding your bot to discord.place, you agree to our Bot Submission Guidelines. <note>
contentPolicy.note: * Can be found in our Discord server.

areYouReady.label: Are you ready?
areYouReady.description: By clicking the button below, you agree to our Bot Submission Guidelines and you confirm that you are the owner of the bot.

pastDenials.title: Past Denials
pastDenials.subtitle: View the bots that you have submitted to discord.place but were denied. (last 7 days)

emptyErrorState.title: It's quiet in here...
emptyErrorState.message: You have not submitted any bots to discord.place that were denied.

countdown.expired: You can add the bot again now.
countdown.expiresIn: This denial will expire in <countdown> You can't add the bot again until then.

myEmojis.title: My Emojis
myEmojis.subtitle: View or manage the emojis that you have listed on discord.place. You can also submit a new emoji to discord.place.

listedEmojis.title: Listed Emojis
listedEmojis.subtitle: Here, you can see the emojis that you have listed on discord.place.

emptyErrorState.title: It's quiet in here...
emptyErrorState.message: You have not listed any emojis on discord.place.

newEmoji.title: New Emoji
newEmoji.subtitle: Submit a new emoji to discord.place.

note.title: Note
note.description: Your submitted emoji will be reviewed by our team before it is listed on discord.place. Please make sure that your emoji is not violating our emoji submission guidelines. Our emoji submission guidelines can be found in our <link>.

myTemplates.title: My Templates
myTemplates.subtitle: View templates that you have listed on discord.place. You can also submit a new template to discord.place.

listedTemplates.title: Listed Templates
listedTemplates.subtitle: Here, you can see the templates that you have listed on discord.place.

emptyErrorState.title: It's quiet in here...
emptyErrorState.message: You have not listed any templates on discord.place.

newTemplate.title: New Template
newTemplate.subtitle: Submit a new template to discord.place.

note.title: Note
note.description: Your submitted template will be reviewed by our team before it is listed on discord.place. Please make sure that your template is not violating our template submission guidelines. Our template submission guidelines can be found in our <link>.

mySounds.title: My Sounds
mySounds.subtitle: View sounds that you have listed on discord.place. You can also submit a new sound to discord.place.

listedSounds.title: Listed Sounds
listedSounds.subtitle: Here, you can see the sounds that you have listed on discord.place.

emptyErrorState.title: It's quiet in here...
emptyErrorState.message: You have not listed any sounds on discord.place.

newSound.title: New Sound
newSound.subtitle: Submit a new sound to discord.place.

note.title: Note
note.description: Your submitted sound will be reviewed by our team before it is listed on discord.place. Please make sure that your sound is not violating our sound submission guidelines. Our sound submission guidelines can be found in our <link>.

addSound.title: Adding a new sound
addSound.subtitle: You're about to submit a new sound to discord.place. This means your sound will be listed on discord.place and everyone will be able to see it. You can remove your sound from discord.place at any time.

toast.soundAdded: Sound {{soundName}} added! You will be redirected to the sound page in a few seconds.
toast.invalidFile: Invalid file format. Only .mp3 files are allowed.
toast.audioDurationExceeded: Audio duration exceeded. Maximum audio duration is {{duration}} seconds.
toast.fileSizeExceeded: File size exceeded. Maximum file size is {{size}} MB.

file.label: Sound File
file.description: Upload your sound file here. Only .mp3 files are allowed.

name.label: Name
name.description: Add a name for your sound.

categories.label: Categories
categories.description: Select all categories that your sound belongs to. This will help users find your sound.

contentPolicy.label: Content Policy
contentPolicy.description: By adding your sound to discord.place, you agree to our Sound Submission Guidelines. <note>
contentPolicy.note: * Can be found in our Discord server.
